Reviews.Title: Excellent choice for a middle range unlocked phone!
Reviews.Author: Art Emperor
Reviews.Content: I originally wanted to stick to my budget and bought the HTC Wildfire from Amazon. Unfortunately, the one I got was Arabic version and did not have the Android Market app on it. I finally returned it and went for the more expensive HTC Legend instead. Am I glad that I did!!  It is solidly constructed with an all Aluminum body. The Amole screen is beautiful. The processor is fast enough for what I need. And I finally can enjoy all the great apps from the Market. I am having so much fun using this little gadget. I do have an iPad2, but sometimes I don't feel like carrying it with me when I am on the road. So the Legend is the perfect size in my pocket. I do wish the screen is another half inch larger, but I didn't want to go up on my budget to a Desire level phone. Overall, I am supper pleased with my purchase. And the seller was great in answering my questions via email, also they delivered the phone in 2 days!

ProductInfo.Name: HTC A6363 Legend Unlocked Cell Phone-International Version (Black)
